name: Bias (itch) (SMABVERSE)
description:
"Totally not biased."

THIS GAME IS MADE IN 8 HOURS FOR TRIJAM #204

In this short game you will get 10 "friend requests" from creatures. You have to both accept 5 requests and block 5 requests. After you chose who your allies are and who your foes are, you will have a "team meeting" and after that the true battle begins!

This game is 100% made by me (Shakur Bakhtali), except for 2 free assets, which are one soundtrack and a font.

Enjoy!

My YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/@Smabverse

All My Links: https://github.com/SMABVERSE/LINK-SITE/wiki

PS. Feel free to share your playthrough of Bias in the comments down below!
